Posts.EditableText: Many a times my mobile browser hets stuck and has to be refreshed, thus resetting the progress. Is there any way to play downloaded files offline in android ?
Posts.HTML: Many a times my mobile browser hets stuck and has to be refreshed, thus resetting the progress. Is there any way to play downloaded files offline in android ?

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately not; it would likely require a complete rebuild of the client.
Posts.HTML: Unfortunately not; it would likely require a complete rebuild of the client.
